data.description:
Prepare for a pulse-pounding battle against the darkness in "Monster Rush" an adrenaline-fueled shooter game that thrusts you into a relentless struggle for survival against waves of terrifying monsters. As the sun sets and shadows lengthen, you find yourself trapped in two harrowing environments: the foreboding depths of a sinister forest and the chilling silence of a long-forgotten tomb. Armed with nothing but a trusty pistol and a finite cache of ammunition, you must stand your ground against a relentless onslaught of undead creatures, including zombies, skeletons, and other unholy abominations.
 
Dark forest, where every rustle of leaves and distant moan sends shivers down your spine. The atmosphere is thick with tension as you navigate through the eerie landscapes of the forest and the claustrophobic confines of the tomb, with danger lurking around every corner. With each passing moment, the darkness grows deeper, and the monsters grow more aggressive, testing your courage and resolve with every step.

The gameplay is fast-paced and exhilarating, as you must quickly react to the relentless assault of enemies and unleash a hail of bullets to keep them at bay. With each successful kill, you earn precious ammunition, allowing you to replenish your dwindling supply and continue the fight against the encroaching horde. But ammunition is scarce, and every shot counts. You must carefully manage your resources and make every bullet count if you hope to survive the night.
data.developer: Cacao Mobile SP Z O O
data.publisher: Cacao Mobile SP Z O O

changelog.change_log:
- Location: add trees
- Lighting: delete point light, add spotlight
- Faster mob spawning
- Reduced build size
